name: Deeds, etc.
text:
§651-46  Deeds, etc.  The officer shall execute and deliver, to any purchaser at any such sale, such certificate of purchase, or conveyance, as may be necessary. [CC 1859, §1026; RL 1925, §2450; RL 1935, §4149; RL 1945, §10176; RL 1955, §233-45; HRS §651-46]
 
Case Notes
 
  If invalid levy, no title passes to purchaser.  21 H. 745 (1913).
  Mortgage made by debtor after attachment being void, conveyance free of such mortgage did not convey a greater interest than the debtor had at time of sale.  51 H. 164, 454 P.2d 116 (1969).
  Cited:  16 H. 106, 110 (1904).
